entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Dome Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:34 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 30 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023
